title: Material Metronome
summary: A simple metronome with a touch of material.
description: The Material Metronome is a simple, yet effective app to get a tempo or beat going.Features-Start at any tempo from 1 to 250-Choose between different sounds; Cowbell, Woodblock, Electronic 1, Electronic 2-Use 11 different bar counts 2/4 to 12/4-Accent the first note of a bar-Keep it going while in a different app-Save configuration to up to four different profilesPermissionsWe do not like permission hungry apps and neither should you but here are the permissions we do request.•    Wakelock - Lets the app keep the screen on if set in the settings•    Vibrator - Relays the tempo on Android Wear devices•    Billing - Adds the ability to donate.
descriptionHTML:
The Material Metronome is a simple, yet effective app to get a tempo or beat going.


Features

-Start at any tempo from 1 to 250

-Choose between different sounds; Cowbell, Woodblock, Electronic 1, Electronic 2

-Use 11 different bar counts 2/4 to 12/4

-Accent the first note of a bar

-Keep it going while in a different app

-Save configuration to up to four different profiles



Permissions
We do not like permission hungry apps and neither should you but here are the permissions we do request.


• Wakelock - Lets the app keep the screen on if set in the settings

• Vibrator - Relays the tempo on Android Wear devices

• Billing - Adds the ability to donate.
comments: Too buggy.. Crashes often. Ameture effort of app development
Crashed I have a Samsung Galaxy Note 5 and it crashed.DO NOT GET
Unfortunately it crashes on opening - Moto G2 running 6.0 Marshmallow
App crash on launch On cm13
Great app Still wish there was a way to get rid of that banner ad.
recentChanges: New notification to match lollipop guidelines.
Added back the woodblock and cowbell options.  Added a setting to make the screen flash when a beat is played.  New animations.

Added to option for X/8 time.  Fixed a few bugs so there should be fewer crashes.  Updated some things to reflect material design changes.  NOTE: Instrumental sounds were removed from this update because they were not acurate.  Expect an update soon on rather or not they will make a return.
